title: Real estate mogul abandons sons in school pick-up line to murder wife, flee the country with millions
itunes:title: Real estate mogul abandons sons in school pick-up line to murder wife, flee the country with millions
description:
A Southern California millionaire charged with murdering his wife is believed to have fled the US with part of his fortune, but police are hoping to catch the accused killer using one of Nancy Grace's favorite tools -- a true crime podcast. Newport Beach police spokeswoman Jennifer Manzella is the host and producer of “Countdown to Capture,” a  six-part podcast series that features detectives sharing their evidence and theories with the hope listeners will help them find 54-year-old Peter Chadwick. They are joined by forensics expert Karen Smith, lawyer Troy Slayton, psycho analyst Dr. Bethany Marshall, & reporter Robyn Walensky.
